title: CYBER_COWBOY
author: CYBER_COWBOY
content: Is AlphaBay down again or got a new URL?I have tried to log on but cant connect to it.

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.body: It's been down since 2017. Perhaps you're on a knockoff site?

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: No its not been down since 2017 lol, you can read about it all over google.It did go up again and been working since last month, i guess you never used it and trust everything you read online.i been sold things and order stuff freqently.Wish you all good.

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.body: That's just a copycat coasting off the same name and honestly, you should be extra careful about that. There's never been a time when one main DN site went down and "came back online" and it worked out. Stick to the trusted, long-term sites.The founder of Alphabay is dead. Whatever site claims to be Alphabay isn't the original in any sincere capacity.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.created_time: February 28, 2023, 10:37:37 AMLast edit: February 28, 2023, 01:20:23 PM by CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: nioctib_100 on February 28, 2023, 03:57:12 AMThat's just a copycat coasting off the same name and honestly, you should be extra careful about that. There's never been a time when one main DN site went down and "came back online" and it worked out. Stick to the trusted, long-term sites.The founder of Alphabay is dead. Whatever site claims to be Alphabay isn't the original in any sincere capacity.Lol. I know he is dead. So are the founder of apple, but you can still buy apple products. Its the real website and not a phishing site, the main site did go up again and has been up for two years. I am shocked about the knowledge on this forum    Why you even comment when you obvious dont know anything about the topic?I been using it since their relaunch 2021 and know what I am talking about.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: AlphaBay is this something like Pirate Bay? Remember this one when I was younger to get software and games. Now there is this one but never used it https://www.tpbproxypirate.com/

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: mich on March 01, 2023, 07:25:06 AMAlphaBay is this something like Pirate Bay? Remember this one when I was younger to get software and games. Now there is this one but never used it https://www.tpbproxypirate.com/What you should of done before posting to prevent making yourself look a little silly. Just because the pirate bay and alpha bay both have the word bay in their name, does not mean they are similar or the same.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: Car22 on March 04, 2023, 01:50:31 AMYes same here happening too...You found out any news?

comments.author: monedauno
comments.body: When trying to access the site via my computer, the IP Address and the Domain of AlphaBay is also showing.A:AlphaBay is down!I had a similar issue.  On this site the browser is blocking my website.  When I open a new page I can't see the domain bar.  It seems the old one is not updated.  What I was trying to do was to open the site again, but it is a different site, so I opened the old one.  When I then opened the new one it just went away.  I am now getting the same error.What I did was right when opening the new one.  After it was closed the old site was no longer on the new server.  When I opened a new one, AlphaBay was still there.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: monedauno on May 04, 2023, 01:14:04 PMWhen trying to access the site via my computer, the IP Address and the Domain of AlphaBay is also showing.A:AlphaBay is down!I had a similar issue.  On this site the browser is blocking my website.  When I open a new page I can't see the domain bar.  It seems the old one is not updated.  What I was trying to do was to open the site again, but it is a different site, so I opened the old one.  When I then opened the new one it just went away.  I am now getting the same error.What I did was right when opening the new one.  After it was closed the old site was no longer on the new server.  When I opened a new one, AlphaBay was still there.I am sorry but I don't understand a thing, could you explain for someone that is not 100% with his English?
